例文: My stomach growled because I was hungry.

意味: ジャンクフード、体に悪い食べ物
例文: I eat too much junk food.
I try to eat healthy food every day.
She often fights with herself about what to eat.
The ice cream is in the frozen food aisle.
Frozen vegetables are easy to cook.
I love the smell of fresh bread from the bakery.
Whole wheat bread is healthier than white bread.
Too much cholesterol is bad for your heart.
Let’s take a break and cool off.
